snippet: Sheldon G. Adelson, the casino owner and Republican donor, lost a $60 million libel lawsuit involving an accusation that he condoned prostitution in his Macau casinos.
abstract: Casino owner and Republican donor Sheldon G Adelson loses $60 million libel lawsuit in which he said National Jewish Democratic Council, spread false accusation that he had condoned prostitution in his Macau casinos.
lead_paragraph: Sheldon G. Adelson, the casino owner and Republican donor, lost a $60 million libel lawsuit involving an accusation that he condoned prostitution in his Macau casinos.

headline.main: Nevada: Casino Owner Loses Libel Suit
headline.print_headline: Nevada: Casino Owner Loses Libel Suit
